PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-04962002-03-280,  ,  ,  TC,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of GHISLAINE RICHARD, of Montreal, Quebec, as a director of the Canadian Air Transport Security Authority, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective April 1, 2002; and appointment of GHISLAINE RICHARD, to be known as the Vice-Chairperson of the Canadian Air Transport Security Authority, to act in the stead of the Chairperson in the event of the absence or incapacity of the Chairperson, during the term referred above.
Attachments
